example.name: autogen1
example.text: The leadership hopes to move the compromise measure promptly to the White House

example.name: autogen2
example.text: A compromise between bulls and bears puts remaining assets and cash -- including its 44 % stake in its publicly traded pipeline -- at $ 2 billion .
example.arg: puts remaining assets and cash -- including its 44 % stake in its publicly traded pipeline -- at $ 2 billion
